text: Saint-Laurent-les-Bains is a former commune in the Ardèche département in southern France. On 1 January 2019, it was merged into the new commune of Saint-Laurent-les-Bains-Laval-d'Aurelle.Arrêté préfectoral 29 October 2018 == References == Category:Former communes in Ardèche
title: Saint-Laurent-les-Bains
